title: someoneontwitter
author: someoneontwitter
content: Hi,We are launching Free Mint project tomorrow, and we are looking for REAL Twitter exposure.Followers, rt and likes to buzz about itTele gram @mnc2021

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: someoneontwitter on June 10, 2022, 01:44:24 PMHi,We are launching Free Mint project tomorrow, and we are looking for REAL Twitter exposure.Followers, rt and likes to buzz about itTele gram @mnc2021this is not the right way to present what you need, if your project is like that, don't expect special success with it.what exactly are you looking for here, influencers or more Twitter accounts? Only followers and likes, or do you want promotions over that SM?

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: ^^^^ What examplens said! In addition, since this is the Bitcoin related services section, your thread does not belong here unless you intend to pay your campaign participants in BTC.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: someoneontwitter on June 10, 2022, 01:44:24 PMWe are launching Free Mint project tomorrow, and we are looking for REAL Twitter exposure.Followers, rt and likes to buzz about itTo get “real” subscribers, you either need to motivate them to follow you automatically or pay them in the form of a payments/BOUNTY campaign, and the more you pay in Bitcoin, the more experienced members and valuable Twitter accounts you will get.It will not cost you much, it will be about $2000 to 10K depending on the number of followers you need and how active they are and the conditions of their accounts.In this forum, most of us are interested in Bitcoin and not NFT, you will probably find more interaction in other forums.
